transArray.content: The room is fully equipped and the front desk staff is attentive. I thought the oatmeal chocolate was delicious when I checked in. I gave some more at the front desk when I checked out.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us, but not getting your five-point review proves that we still have room for improvement. We hope you can see our progress and efforts next time you stay, Orange Beijing Five All the staff of Kesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
